description.narrative: By the end of 2015, independent oversight and monitoring bodies, including CSOs, monitor the impact of relevant education, health and social welfare policies on the most disadvantaged children and use relevant findings to advocate for policy changes.

sector.narrative: Child poverty analysis towards policy change (Profiling, mapping and identifying drivers of multi-dimensional and monetary poverty of children, modelling and simulation of policy options)
Country programme process (including UNDAF planning and CCA)
Development of multi-sectoral legislation/policies/strategies/action plans supporting development and participation of adolescents
Independent national child rights institution / ombudsperson
Legal and policy framework related to violence, exploitation and abuse

description.narrative: Justice, Law and Order human rights affairs
Other General Services support to civil society
Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities policy, planning and administration

title.narrative: Serbia United Nations Development Assistance Framework
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
2019 Serbia: Country Programme Evaluation for Serbia (2016-2020)
Serbia 2019 Annual Report on Results for Children
Serbia Country Office 2020 Annual Report on Results for Children
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By the end of 2015, independent oversight and monitoring bodies, including CSOs, monitor the impact of relevant education, health and social welfare policies on the most disadvantaged children and use relevant findings to advocate for policy changes.

Number of strategic child-focused reports produced by Republic Ombudsman Office that have been presented in public, communicated with decision-makers and have impact on improvements in policy and/or practice

baseline.value: 1 since the establishment of the Republic Ombudsman Office

target.value: 2015:2 reports per year with 50% of recommendations implemented

actual.value: 2015:1 general report issued for 2104 and submitted to the Parliament. Out of 91 recommendation for children, 83.72% are implemented. Ombudsman released 4 special reports related to children (asylum seekers, children in detention and victims of sexual violence, women victims of violence)

title.narrative: Number of public hearings on child rights related legislation

Civil society coalitions' monitoring and reporting on the impact of relevant policies and budget allocations in education, social welfare and health policies on the most disadvantaged children and use of findings for policy dialogue

target.value: 2015:At least one annual monitoring report published and used as an advocacy tool for dialogue with policy makers in order to influence policies and budget allocations

actual.value: 2015:MODS produced a position paper on inclusive education, Coalition of CSOs around Child Rights Center produced CRC shadow report, MODS produced Child Protection Index

title.narrative: Share of recommendations related to children based on citizens' complaints submitted to the Commissioner

target.value: 2015:10% of recommendations as an average across 5 years relate to children

actual.value: 2015:9 recommendations related to discrimination against children in 2014 equaling 19% (9 of 48). 8 opinions related to discrimination against children equaling 27% (8 of 30)
